question:
Which of the following matches of the name of the boundary lines and their related country are correct?
1. MacMohan line- Between India and china
2. Radcliff line- Between India and Pakistan
3. Durand Line- Between India and Afghanistan
4. Palk strait- Between India and Sri Lanka
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Durand Line was marked in the year 1893. During that time Pakistan was a part of india. But after 1947 Pakistan got seperated. So, at present Durand Line is situated between Pakistan and Afghanistan.
